name: Ice Scream 8: Rod Sullivan & Friends
description:
Ice Scream is An Amazing Popular Saga by Keplerains Horror Games.

Enjoy This Fanmade game made by Gaming King.

Rod was trying to break the door, He broke the door and Freezed the kids and were sent to The Execution Waiting Floor. In This game Play as J and Escape With Your Friends. Rod Sullivan Will Keep Chasing you Be Careful about it. Slove The Puzzles and Be Careful of traps at the factory one mistake can lead you to dead. 

Good Luck.

• For Feedback and Help Join our Discord Server - https://discord.gg/PncYCkpqMy
